sOtta#ravEqdira#bravIqth sarvAqn mayAq kAmAqn vya#SnavaqthEtiq tE dEqvA a#kAmayaqntAsu#rAqn BrAtRu#vyAnaqBi Ba#vEqmEtiq tE#&juhavuH siq(gm)qhIra#si sapatnasAqhI svAhEtiq tE&su#rAqn BrAtRu#vyA-naqBya#Bavaqn tE&su#rAqn
